input_text.Prompt:
Product name:
Lively "Happy Birthday" Party Cone Hats - 8 Count

Product specifications:
Birthday party cone hats
Size: 6" high and 4.25" wide base
Strong strings
Sold in a pack of 8
Match with any themed party
Suitable for both boys and girls

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Lively "Happy Birthday" Party Cone Hats - 8 Count are birthday party cone hats sold in a pack of 8. Size is 6" high and 4.25" wide base. Strong strings make it easy to wear. Match with any themed party and suitable for both boys and girls.
input_text.Response B: These Lively "Happy Birthday" Party Cone Hats are the perfect addition to any birthday celebration! The fun and festive design will make everyone feel like they're celebrating in style. The hats are also a great way to help everyone stay in the birthday spirit. Plus, they're a great way to add a bit of color to the party. The hats are made of sturdy paperboard, so they're durable enough to last throughout the party, yet soft enough to be comfortable to wear. They also feature elastic chin straps to keep them securely in place. In addition to birthdays, these cute cone hats would also work well for other festive occasions, such as New Year's Eve, graduations, or even Halloween.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
